value:
$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse, listen well. Tomorrow, my
knights will attack the forces of Hel.$k$pWe must force their retreat into the
realm of the dead and get that
barrier back up.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, Father. The Order of Heroes, led
by Commander Anna, will take part.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Do as you wish. Just promise me one
thing.$k$pIf you meet Hel, do not engage her.
If you see her, run.$k$pBetter you don't get near enough to
see her at all...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Father—do you know her?$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Twenty years ago...I fought her.$k$pThe scar I bear is her doing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|A foe who could wound you so
harshly? I understand the danger
there.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You do, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It is not that she was strong and I was
weak. Death is not measured on such
a scale.$k$pDeath comes for all the living. That
cannot be denied. And Hel is death
itself.$k$pThe only reason I survived my
encounter with her was blind luck—
nothing more.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I see...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You must listen to me, Alfonse. Do
not approach Hel—no matter what.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel, the ruler of the dead... To think
we'd face someone like that.$k$pIf we could strike swiftly and take the
head of our enemy, this war would
end in an instant...$k$pBut that seems... Well...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Let us concentrate on the foes we
find in front of us for now. It's time
we head into battle!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|So you will join the fight,
$Nu.$k$pAhead, you will find the army of Hel.$k$pAnd that is also where you will most
likely find my mother...$k$p
